ti

Class Indexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ti.Indexer

  • public class Indexer
extends Object
    This class contains the logic to run the indexing process of the search engine.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DocumentProcessor docProcessor 
      protected File pathToCollection 
      protected File pathToIndex 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Indexer(File pathToIndex, File pathToCollection, DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
      Creates a new indexer with the given paths and document processor.

      Runs the first pass of the indexer.
      protected void processDocument(File docFile, Index ind)
      Process the original document in the specified path and add it to the given index.
      void run()
      Run the indexing process in two passes and save the index to disk.

      Runs the second pass of the indexer.

    • Field Detail

      • pathToIndex

        protected File pathToIndex

      • pathToCollection

        protected File pathToCollection

        protected DocumentProcessor docProcessor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Indexer

        public Indexer(File pathToIndex,
       File pathToCollection,
       DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
        Creates a new indexer with the given paths and document processor.
        Parameters:
        pathToIndex - path to the index directory.
        pathToCollection - path to the original documents directory.
        docProcessor - document processor to extract terms.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws IOException
        Run the indexing process in two passes and save the index to disk.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while indexing.

      • firstPass

        protected void firstPass(Index ind)
                  throws IOException
        Runs the first pass of the indexer. It builds the inverted index by iterating all original document files and calling processDocument(java.io.File, ti.Index).
        Parameters:
        ind - the index.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while processing a document.

      • secondPass

        protected void secondPass(Index ind)
        Runs the second pass of the indexer. Here it traverses the inverted index to compute and store IDF, update weights in the postings, build the direct index, and compute document norms.
        Parameters:
        ind - the index.

      • processDocument

        protected void processDocument(File docFile,
                   Index ind)
                        throws IOException
        Process the original document in the specified path and add it to the given index.

        After extracting the document terms, it populates the vocabulary and document structures, and adds the corresponding postings to the inverted index.

        Parameters:
        docFile - the path to the original document file.
        ind - the index to add the document to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurrs while processing this document.
